rec.description: The whois record containing the contact data.

rec:fqdn.description: The domain associated with the whois record.

rec:asof.description: The date of the whois record.

type.description: The contact type (e.g., registrar, registrant, admin, billing, tech, etc.).

id.description: The ID associated with the contact.

email.description: The email address of the contact.

orgname.description: The name of the contact organization.

address.description: The content of the street address field(s) of the contact.

city.description: The content of the city field of the contact.

state.description: The content of the state field of the contact.

country.description: The two-letter country code of the contact.

phone.description: The content of the phone field of the contact.

fax.description: The content of the fax field of the contact.

url.description: The URL specified for the contact.

whois:fqdn.description: The whois server FQDN for the given contact (most likely a registrar).
